definitions.body: abs. ´[[ר]]: Ps 32:9 restraining mouth of horse or ass (+[[מֶתֶג]]); fig. of ´[[שֵׁם י]]:, [[עַל־לְחָיֵי עַמִּים]]´[[ר]]: Is 30:28; [[מִפָּנַי שִׁלֵָּחוּ]] ´[[ר]]: Job 30:11, i.e. threw off restraint.
sf. [[כֶּפֶל רִסְנוֹ]] Job 41:5 the double of his jaw, his double jaws (of croc.), si vera 1.; connexion of mngs. strange, ‖[[פְּנֵי לְבוּשׁוֹ ]], whence GHBW right Du conj. [[סִיׁנוֹ]].
